info.title: Bug Tracker project
info.description: It can create virtual Bug Tracker projects for a team.

method.name: create
method.description: Create a virtual Bug Tracker project. The request must be from a registered account.

parameter.name: $description
parameter.description: The project description. It can be empty. It is empty by default.

method.returndescription: The project id on success, false on failure.

method.name: getIssues
method.description: Get all issues of a project in a given version (optional).

parameter.name: $version
parameter.description: The project's version. You can leave empty for all versions.

method.returndescription: An array of all issues in the given version. If no version is given, the array contains all issues for all versions by version id (key).
